Perceptor:

"ahh I seee"hissed Perceptor who was a little puzzle altough he 
didn't show it"Then you can get your revenge here... have you 
kill... someone, Battera?"




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> Battera::
> 
> She smiled up at him. "I am programmed in high social protocols, 
> surveilience, infiltration, data collecting, sabatage and airial 
> tactics in fighting, some hand to hand training. And wouldn't you 
> know it, that is the reason I was imprisoned. My leader sendsme 
in, I 
> get all he wanted, then when a fight breaks out, I get injured and 
> left behind. Those maximals, " her voice filled with rage and 
> hatred,"Not only let me live, but they fixed me up, then put me in 
a 
> cage in the middle of a mountain. Leave me there to rust all by my 
> self." Her stopped walking for a sec and looked down the hall past 
> Perceptor. "I called to my leader, but that over grown chicken 
didn't 
> hear me. he just laughed into the com and said, one less bot to 
worry 
> about. I only hope he is now scrap metal."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
